entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 1:30 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.5°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 13 February 2023
